resources.string: Economy and bussines is designed to secure required level of general and professional knowledge. Mainly in economy, massive data processing, social security and law.
Perspective and modern field of study thats focused on usage of renewable energy resources with devices as thermodynamical pumps, solar panels, water and wind power plants.
Field of study with wide possibility of usage in different areas that are focused on computing.
Field of study that reacts to the evolution of elecronics with emphasis on informational technologies, automatization and robotics, mobile networks and medical equipment.

BBS Donnersbergkreis was founded in 1996. Our school is located at two different places, one is at Rockenhausen, the second is at Eisenberg. Both towns are situated in the region of the Donnersbergkreis.

BBS Donnersbergkreis is a school with different types of schools, for example the Berufliche Gymnasium a school form that enables the students to attend a university. There also is the vocational school where the students can study their future profession. This could be the profession in the electric industry, in car repair and also in the field of economy and business.
Our Students also can study Social and Administrative field, like social service for children and seniors.

Since several years BBS Donnersbergkreis is proud to offer its students a cooperation with the University of Worms. Students of the Berufliche Gymnasium can attend theoretical and practical lessons offered by the university. This is used for example by the students that are enrolled to the a-grade courses in informatics.
We would be pleased to invite you as our guests at our schools. Come and visit us!
